text:
Hello everyone, I need an information about the API engagement if anybody can help :pray:

Hi there ! I got a problem retrieving data from the API (<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/engagements/engagements-overview>)

For example the API send me task suppressed by users on HubSpot. Is it normal ?

I'm working with python I request the data from this route :
```<https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements/paged>```
I get the request including the offset. There's no problem in my code since I manage to get all the data from the API. However, the API send me suppressed data such as suppressed note or suppressed task which I can't understand since it doesn't appear in HubSpot.

Is it normal for HubSpot, could it be that I need to add a extra param to my request to get only not suppressed data ?

Hello, newbie here, so very sorry if I'm writing to the wrong channel.
Is there anyway to update the logged calls for the contact via the api? I couldn't seem to find anything.
Which calling software are you using?
Puzzel, so I think I might need to implement the request myself, because I couldn't find anything in their docs related to HubSpot
Is there any way to do a batch upsert and ignore email address errors?

I want to automate an import of a few 1000 records, but the only way I can do it is using the import per single record, but I need to add a `sleep()` so that I don't exceed the API threshold, but then it takes up to 30 minutes to import 1000's of records...
